require_waiting_for_result.description: [bool]Requires that the interactor needs to wait for the interaction before making new interacts.

disable_interaction_while_interacting.description: [bool]Indicates if we automatically disable the interactable zones when we are start the interaction

allow_move.description: [bool]True if this interactable is allowed to move in the world.

perform_line_of_sight_check.description: [bool]True if this interactable should perform a line of sight check towards the interactor.

mode.description: Describes who may interact with this interactable.

interact_audio_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the item is interacted with

interact_audio_event_vo.description: [string]Audio VO event to trigger when the item is interacted with
